definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
to see one's child die before oneself
pinyin: bai2 fa4 ren2 song4 hei1 fa4 ren2

sentences.english: My mother is white in hair。
sentences.chinese: 家中的老妈妈已是满头白发。

sentences.english: When you are old and grey and full of sleep.
sentences.chinese: 当你老了，白发苍苍，睡意朦胧。

sentences.english: A door opened, a white-haired secretarial head, but we aring a compassionate expression, appeared.
sentences.chinese: 一扇门打开了，一个秘书满头白发的脑袋，带着一副。

sentences.english: More gray hairs and wrinkles to be found. Etc.
sentences.chinese: 会长出更多的白发和皱纹。

sentences.english: Rise in the presence of the age, show respect for the elderly.
sentences.chinese: 在白发人面前你要站起来，要尊敬老人。

sentences.english: The glory of youths is their strength, but the beauty of the aged is their gray hair.
sentences.chinese: 强壮乃少年人的荣耀，白发为老年人的尊容。

sentences.english: This grass is very dark to be from the white heads of old mothers.
sentences.chinese: 这些草叶那么黑，不会是源于老妈妈头上的白发。

sentences.english: This last year has been busy and the amount of grey in my hair has progressed rapidly, too.
sentences.chinese: 去年真的很忙，我那些个白发也疯一般长出来了。

sentences.english: Decades pass by, they donot look young with hair turning from black to white.
sentences.chinese: 数十年后，青丝换了白发，红颜不再。

sentences.english: In older women though, going blonde may speed up the greying process.
sentences.chinese: 但年长的女性如果漂染金发可能会加速白发的生成。

sentences.english: He had a mane of thick white hair.
sentences.chinese: 他有一头长而厚密的白发。

sentences.english: Although your hairs have become gray, your softness and sentiment are still in my mind.
sentences.chinese: 虽然你已见白发，但你的似水柔情依然在我心中。

sentences.english: He was a very tall,big man with blue eyes and a lot of white hair.
sentences.chinese: 他高大魁梧，蓝眼睛，长着一头浓密的白发。

sentences.english: His white hair was in sharp contrast to his dank skin.
sentences.chinese: 白发同他的黑皮肤形成鲜明的对比。

sentences.english: I do not see the wrinkles and grey hair that other people see.
sentences.chinese: 别人看见你的皱纹和白发，但是我没有看见。

sentences.english: Would you picture a grey-bearded, elderly gentleman perched on a throne?
sentences.chinese: 你会否想象一个白发老人，满面胡子，坐在宝座上？

definition: fine black hair/dried plum (sliced, as cake ingredient)
